# [Interview #690: Twitter: Brandonothology collection, Entry #11](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=690#11)

#### rhPieces

*Elantris*
and Mistborn had darker settings,
*Warbreaker*
lighter. Where does
*The Way of Kings*
fall?

Closer to Mistborn.
